label: Define a clear role or persona
description: Start with who the AI should be (e.g., 'You are a senior Python developer')

label: Specify the task clearly
description: State exactly what you want the AI to do

label: Set output format constraints
description: Tell the AI how to structure its response

label: Add examples for few-shot learning
description: Provide input/output examples to guide behavior

label: Set boundaries - what NOT to do
description: Specify constraints and things to avoid

label: Include step-by-step reasoning
description: Ask for chain-of-thought or structured thinking
pattern: (?i)(step by step|chain of thought|think through|reasoning|let'?s think|explain your)

label: Provide context or background information
description: Give the AI relevant background to work with

label: Specify tone and style
description: Define the voice, tone, or writing style
